definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: The cardinal clinical manifestation was painless solid enlargement of the testis.
sentences.chinese: 睾丸无痛性肿大为其主要临床表现。

sentences.english: A physical examination incidentally revealed an enlarged left scrotum.
sentences.chinese: 理学检查发现左阴囊肿大。

sentences.english: When liver disease is expected, splenomegaly should be sought.
sentences.chinese: 当怀疑肝病时，应该寻找肿大的脾脏。

sentences.english: Large lymph node swellings must be drained.
sentences.chinese: 淋巴结肿大很可能消除。

sentences.english: Indirect sign including carotid lymphnode enlargement was found.
sentences.chinese: 同时可发现颈淋巴结肿大征象。

sentences.english: Standing in front of a mirror will help in looking for any possible swelling on the scrotum.
sentences.chinese: 照著镜子检查会有助于探查阴囊上任何可能的肿大。

sentences.english: They could also have enlarged lymph nodes, lethargy and vertigo.
sentences.chinese: 他们还可能有淋巴结肿大，嗜睡和眩晕等症状。

sentences.english: Firm liver enlargement and biochemical evidence of intrahepatic cholestasis are typical manifestations .
sentences.chinese: 肝硬而肿大和肝内胆汁淤沸的生化改变是典型现象。

sentences.english: Unilateral inguinal lymphadenopathy is usually a response to infection of an ipsilateral lower extremity.
sentences.chinese: 单侧腹股沟区淋巴结肿大常是单侧下肢感染的反应。

sentences.english: Do not have lymph node and liver splenomegaly commonly.
sentences.chinese: 一般无淋巴结及肝脾肿大。

sentences.english: My tonsils were so swollen that I couldn’t open my mouth more than half an inch.
sentences.chinese: 我的扁桃体肿大到了我甚至无法把嘴略微张大一些。

sentences.english: Of inguinal lymph node enlargement medication control method?
sentences.chinese: 腹股沟淋巴结肿大的药物治疗控制方法？

sentences.english: Neck dissection may not be practiced until neck lymph node is positive.
sentences.chinese: 对颈淋巴结未及肿大的患者可暂不行颈淋巴结清扫术。

sentences.english: I have had painless swelling in my scrotum.
sentences.chinese: 我的阴囊有不痛的肿大。

sentences.english: Patients present ascites and obvious spleen enlargement.
sentences.chinese: 患者呈现腹水及明显的脾肿大。

definition: growth (of organism)/proliferation/supernumerary candidate (in imperial examation system)
